teacher_info.intro:
Hey everyone! 
My name is Marina. I am a law student, majoring in criminal justice. 
I have friends from Europe and South America whom I taught Russian. Surprisingly it went successful and fun, and that is why I am here on italki. 
I am passionate about law, education, traveling, and specialty coffee!
And of course, I love learning languages! Currently, I dedicate myself to Portuguese. Italki helped me a lot on my way to learn Portuguese, and I believe I can be useful for Russian learners.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I offer you an opportunity to talk about any topic you want without fear of judgment.
If you want to learn a foreign language... CONGRATULATIONS! You are already awesome. 
Do not be afraid if anything might go wrong. Making mistakes is part of the process! 
If you are nervous about your accent and pronunciation, don't be! An accent just shows that you know more than one language and you should be proud of it.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I will use different strategies based on your Russian level and your needs. We will talk about things that you are interested in. If you have special requests or preferable ways to learn, please let me know. 
Unfortunately, I do not provide classes for beginners. With intermediate and advanced students I discuss any specific topic, for example, an article from Russian social media. This is an easy way to gain some vocabulary.

course_info.trial_description: На пробном уроке мы познакомимся и наметим план дальнейших действий. Я оценю твой уровень владения языка и цель изучения языка.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот урок подходит студентам уровней A1-С2. Мы можем поговорить на любую тему. Если у тебя есть конкретный запрос - дай мне знать ;) На занятии я создам среду, где ты сможешь учить язык естественным путём и не бояться осуждения. Делать ошибки - это часть процесса, так что давай этим наслаждаться!
This lesson is suitable for students at levels A1-B2. We can talk about any topic. If you have a specific request, let me know;) In the lesson, I will create an environment where you can learn the language in a natural way without fear of judgement. Making mistakes is part of the process, so let's enjoy it!

pro_course_detail.title: Legal Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Урок подходит тем, кто уже овладел основами языка. Если ты планируешь изучать юриспруденцию на русском языке, работать в смежной сфере или просто интересуешься - выбирай этот урок! 
The lesson is suitable for those who have already mastered the basics of the language. If you plan to study law in Russian, work in a related field, or are simply interested - choose this lesson!

Привет! Как дела? Меня зовут Маша. Обожаю этот мир, новые знакомства и разные культуры! Очень люблю путешествовать и вкусно поесть :) А еще я готовлю натуральный шоколад, могу научить и тебя, но учти, что рецепт будет на русском :)

Hello everybody! My name is Masha. I love this world, different cultures and meet new people. I really like to travel and eat delicious food :) I cook natural chocolate, I can also teach you, but keep in mind that the recipe will be in Russian ;)
teacher_info.about_me:

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я окончила курс профессиональной переподготовки «Методика преподавания русского языка как неродного и иностранного» в Государственном институте русского языка им. А.С. Пушкина. 

I graduated from the professional retraining course "Methods of teaching Russian as a non-native and foreign language" at the Pushkin State Institute of the Russian Language.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Мои уроки интерактивные с использованием коммуникативного метода. На моих уроках ты узнаешь то, что не найдешь ни в одном учебнике :) Круто, что ты выбрал изучать именно русский язык, потому как это очень интересный и увлекательный путь! Ничего не бойся, я помогу тебе. До встречи на наших уроках!

My lessons are interactive using a communicative method. In my lessons you will learn something that you will not find in any textbook :) It's cool that you chose to study Russian, because it's a very interesting way. Don't worry, I'll help you. See you in our lessons ;)

course_info.trial_description: Hi, my name is Masha. Nice to meet you. I'm a native Russian speaker, and you? Let's get to know each other better )

pro_course_detail.title: Русский для начинающих / Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот урок для тебя, если ты только начинаешь изучать русский. Мы сосредоточимся на всех аспектах языка, таких как грамматика, лексика, произношение, чтение, аудирование и письмо. И даже если ты падаешь в обморок от вида русского алфавита, уже после первого урока ты сможешь прочитать и произнести некоторые русские слова :)

This lesson is for you if you are just starting to learn Russian. We will focus on all aspects of language such as grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, reading, listening comprehension and writing. Аnd even if you faint from the sight of the Russian alphabet, after the first lesson you will be able to read and pronounce some Russian words :)

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика / Conversational practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот курс идеально подойдет для тебя, если ты уже владеешь русским языком на начальном уровне и выше, а также хочешь улучшить свое произношение или иметь частую разговорную практику с носителем языка.

This course is perfect for you if you can speak elementary Russian and also you want to improve your pronunciation or you need to have frequent conversational practice with a native speaker.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский для продолжающих (А2+ - С1) / Russian for continuing students (А2+ - С1)
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот курс для тебя, если ты уже владеешь русским языком на уровне А2 и выше.

This course is for you if you already speak Russian at A2 level and above.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi there! 

My name is Emil, and I am here to help you practice English through friendly conversations! My main occupation is astrophysicist: I do research on blazars and dark matter. 

Besides my job I have many-many hobbies: cinema, photography, traveling, languages (learning Spanish right now), board games, music, quizzes, and air hockey to name a few. But one of my most prominent hobbies is plain talking: I can talk with you about any topic you like!
teacher_info.short_signature: Russian/English teacher and exam coach with 4 years of teaching experience
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi there! 

My name is Emil, and I am here to help you practice English through friendly conversations! My main occupation is astrophysicist: I do research on blazars and dark matter. 

Besides my job I have many-many hobbies: cinema, photography, traveling, languages (learning Spanish right now), board games, music, quizzes, and air hockey to name a few. But one of my most prominent hobbies is plain talking: I can talk with you about any topic you like!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have been tutoring English for almost five years and learning it for almost all my life. I’ve passed FCE, CAE, and CPE exams, and had a secondary education as a translator. 

But the thing that I’m proud of the most is my experience hosting an English speaking club these past five years. This is not so much work for me as it is fun. In these meetings we gather to share news, be it local, global, or personal, discuss different topics that we feel like discussing, and play board games.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I know how important it is to make lessons exciting and tailored to the needs of every student. This was the exact thing that I often lacked during my education, so I’m trying to give that to my students now.

For me, conversation is key to practicing languages! In my lessons, we will discuss different topics, which you can choose according to your needs, and learn the relevant vocabulary in its intended context.

Need to brush up on your grammar? We can do that via conversation too! Tenses, articles, you name it. All I have to do is ask the right questions that test the right grammar rules. That way, you will not just be cramming the rules but rather learning how to use them in your speech.

course_info.trial_description:
During this lesson, we'll chat a little bit, discussing:
- your level and background in Russian/English,
- the goals you want to set for yourself,
- the materials we’re going to use,
- and the plan for our lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English with integrated vocabulary
pro_course_detail.description:
In this class, we will chat about any topics you'd like. They can be specific topics like formal speech, slang, IT vocabulary, travel vocabulary, you name it.

If you don't have any specific ones in mind, I can suggest general topics (like food, hobbies, health, etc.) with integrated vocabulary that you'll learn how to use in conversations. 

I will help you pick the right words and expressions or paraphrase to explain what you want to say and become more comfortable communicating in English.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский
pro_course_detail.description:
На занятиях по разговорному языку мы будем говорить на любые темы, которые вам интересны! Можем обсуждать новости, болтать про хобби, определять особенности деловой переписки или комментировать только что вышедшие фильмы и сериалы! Или же я могу предлагать различные общие темы (здоровье, спорт, хобби, путешествия и тд). 

Для каждой темы, которую мы обсуждаем, я буду готовить подходящую лексику, фразы и грамматические конструкции, которые помогут вам говорить более комфортно и естественно.

pro_course_detail.title: General English - tailored to your needs!
Writing and exam preparation (IELTS/TOEFL/FCE/CAE/SAT)
pro_course_detail.description:
In this class, I will help you prepare for international English exams, tell you everything about the specifics of each exam, and assist you in finding the best preparation techniques that would work for you. We will use numerous up-to-date mock exams and other relevant materials.

During class, we will be discussing your writing and homework, brushing up on some grammar and vocabulary, and practicing for the speaking part. Depending on how much time you have for your homework, we could also do reading and listening exercises during class. But I encourage you to do these exercises at home and then discuss the most difficult parts during our lessons.

I have passed all three Cambridge exams myself and have a 4-year experience preparing for various exams. My students have passed IELTS (overall band score 7.5+) and TOEFL (overall score 80+) exams.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык
Проверка и редактура текстов на русском языке

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! Thank you for visiting my page. I am a children's writer. I love reading and writing adventure fantasy books.
I myself illustrate my books!
The world of fairy tales opens up endless possibilities of fantasy and imagination!
I put these skills into my classes)!
My lessons are fun and easy!
I build them in a training format. Because my main task is to motivate you to learn the language and get positive, vivid emotions during our classes! After all, a good mood is a key to easy memorization of the language.
I provide my students with OWN DESIGNED MATERIALS. They are variable, comprehensive and structured!
I will be pleased to meet you and have a lesson with you!
Write me))).
teacher_info.introduction: Do you want to visit Russian speaking countries and feel free talking there? Do you want to read original Russian or Ukrainian literature? And searching for a creative and professional language teacher? You are in the right place! I really enjoy giving lessons so always try to bring something new and interesting in my classes. I have been teaching English, Russian and Ukrainian more than 10 years. I also worked as a professor at the Ukrainian University. During this time, I have developed variable courses teaching grammar, speaking, writing, fast learning. If you want to travel, find a work, study abroad or you have any other goal, I will use a program, specially adapted for your needs. We will improve your speaking, writing skills and your knowledge of grammar, increase the vocabulary. Or if you are a beginner – we will start from ABC and phonetics. My lessons are always learner-centered. In my classes I use textbooks, video, audio, pictures, role games, etc. I always create friendly and positive atmosphere during the lesson. My classes are thoroughly planned and structured. Note: Choose the course you would like to study and we will discuss all the goals you would like to meet. When you book a trial lesson with me, please, write some words about your learning experience. You can send me a composition “About Myself”. This will help me to evaluate your basic grammar and writing skills. Hope to talk to you in person. Feel free to contact me!

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! My name is Mariia (Masha) and I am happy to know you are interested in studying one of the three languages I teach.
I was born and raised in Dnipro, Ukraine, but when I was 12 I moved to Kyiv  the city I concider my home. In 2019 I moved to the United States to study art and have recently graduated with a degree in it. Me and my husband are big art nerds. I am also interested in many other fields including medicine, languages, beauty industry, travel, and making new friends. So I really hope we can become not only teacher/student, but friends.
teacher_info.short_signature: Are you up for having some fun while learning a foreign language?
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone! My name is Mariia (Masha) and I am happy to know you are interested in studying one of the three languages I teach.
I was born and raised in Dnipro, Ukraine, but when I was 12 I moved to Kyiv  the city I concider my home. In 2019 I moved to the United States to study art and have recently graduated with a degree in it. Me and my husband are big art nerds. I am also interested in many other fields including medicine, languages, beauty industry, travel, and making new friends. So I really hope we can become not only teacher/student, but friends.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have taught English to different groups of people while serving as a volunteer for my Church. I also taught on italki several years ago and had a blast with over 200 students of mine.
It is difficult to start studying something new, but if you have started and you are really interested in this, it just absorbs you. Studying languages is the same and I understand it. Moreover, it opens new borders for you and your world becomes brighter and wider.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Judging from my own experience, speaking practice is one of the most effective ways of improving your language skills. Applying something, helps you to memorize material you have studied.
During our lessons, my students and I discuss different topics. We also play games from time to time, which creates a good relaxing atmosphere. I believe that you can use your brain to its fullness only in a right mood. I try to find something that makes you feel comfortable and happy so you can enjoy the process of studying. I do adapt my classes to your needs, so feel free to let me know if you have any special requests.

course_info.trial_description: Let's see if you and me are a good language combination. In this class you may ask me any qustions about my teaching style and about the peculiarities of the language you want to learn. You can also experience the teaching model of mine by having a short class with me.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational practice: Russian
pro_course_detail.description: The main focus of the Russian conversational practice is to get you where you will be comfortable expressing yourself. I do not teach Russian grammar in this type of class, but I will make sure you understand what you are saying and why. Hope to see you in my classes soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational practice: Ukrainian
pro_course_detail.description: In our classes I will help you become confident in your speaking and listening skills. You will be able to understand Ukranian native speakers and express yourself properly. I am excited to help you study this awesome language! :)

teacher_info.intro:
Меня зовут Ирина, я живу в Сибири и являюсь носителем русского языка. Мне нравятся языки – как изучать самой, так и обучать русскому языку других. Я люблю общаться с людьми с разных стран, делиться культурой и мыслями. В свободное время я читаю, катаюсь на сноуборде, путешествую, изучаю темы здоровья и счастья человека. Практикую йогу, медитацию и тантру.

I am Irina, a native Russian speaker from Siberia. I am very passionate about languages and meeting people from around the world, sharing our cultures. My hobbies include reading, snowboarding, health/nutrition, science, travel, discovering new places. I practice yoga, tantra and meditation, love to try new things and explore life.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я имею трехлетний опыт преподавания в университете, где я обучала русских и иностранных студентов. 
На своих занятиях я побуждаю студентов говорить на русском как можно больше, учиться выражать свои мысли и задавать вопросы, не боясь совершать ошибки. Чем больше ошибок вы совершаете, тем быстрее вы учитесь! Я терпелива и доброжелательна, и всегда стараюсь создать комфортную, дружелюбную атмосферу. 
The basic language in our classes will be Russian, but I also know English at the B1 level.
My students for now are adults at B1 and higher level.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я верю, что по-настоящему продвинуться в изучении языка поможет только практика и своевременная коррекция ошибок. Поэтому в основе моих занятий лежит неформальное общение, в процессе которого мы будем обсуждать интересные вам темы, обсуждать книги и фильмы, рассказывать друг другу истории. Я, в свою очередь, буду корректировать ваши ошибки в грамматике и построении предложений, объяснять нюансы использования той или иной фразы, смысл идиом или сленговых выражений, предлагать другие варианты слов, которые звучат более естественно. 
Также я могу помочь вам в написании e-mail или резюме, вычитке текста, подготовке к собеседованию, пониманию русской культуры.

In a trial lesson we can get to know each other and discuss your learning goals and how to proceed. I will explain to you what I offer in my lessons and if we have time we will get started and do some exercises!

pro_course_detail.title: Турецкий язык – Turkish for beginners – Türkisch für Anfangern
pro_course_detail.description:
Если вы только начинаете изучать турецкий язык, эти уроки будут очень эффективны для вас!
Я спокойно и очень доступно объясню грамматику турецкого языка. Так как я и сама в своё время прошла весь этап изучения турецкого языка, то понимаю, какие темы вызывают трудности и знаю, с помощью каких ассоциаций и механизмов лучше их объяснить.  Выполняя упражнения, переводя тексты, отрывки песен и рекламу, вы выучите много новых турецких слов. Параллельно я объясняю особенности использования неоднозначных турецких слов, это поможет вам избежать недопонимания с собеседником. Буду рада быть вашим учителем!

This course is designed for people who have never had any contact with Turkish. We will work together to improve your grammar and vocabulary. If you wish to grow your everyday Turkish it is a good course for you. 

In diesem Kurs helfe ich Euch bei Euren ersten Schritten in die türkische Sprache. Wir reden über die Grundlagen der Grammatik, Basisvokabular und wir starten mit ersten kleinen Dialogen. Ich freue mich auf unsere erste Lesson.

pro_course_detail.description:
I'll help you to speak Russian fluently, to improve your pronunciation and to learn new vocabulary!
We can talk different topic and I'll explain you Russian idioms,

pro_course_detail.title: Russian - Rusça - Russisch
pro_course_detail.description: If you need help in improving your grammar, communication and writing skills I’m here for you! I’ll explain grammatical structures in an easy and understandable way during my lessons. You’ll practice new material when we discuss topical issues and issues of everyday life. I prefer my students speak most of lesson time. All study materials will be provided.

teacher_info.intro: Hello, my name is Irina (it's the same as Irene in English). I was born and live in St. Petersburg. I have been working as an online language teacher for about 3 years and in September I started a master's degree program in the field of Russian as a foreign language in Saint Petersburg State University.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello, my name is Irina (it's the same as Irene in English). I was born and live in St. Petersburg. I have been working as an online language teacher for about 3 years and in September I started a master's degree program in the field of Russian as a foreign language in Saint Petersburg State University.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I'm a very patient and attentive teacher - I take into account your goals and teach you at your pace. I love Russian language, culture and my city and my goal - is to teach you my language and give you the opportunity to know Russia without stereotypes.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I work in two directions: first of all, I can teach you Russian if you have no idea how to pronounce the letter "Ж". You'll be able to read in Russian and use Russian cursive. I'll also give you the most important Russian vocabulary and usable phrases. And - of course - Russian Grammar.

Secondly, you can have really cool lessons with me if you know Russian well enough to read authentic Russian texts with the dictionary. Chekhov, Dostoevsky, Tolstoy, Shukshin, Turgenev - we can read and discuss their stories together. These lessons are for you if you want to practice speaking talking about literature.

course_info.trial_description: This lesson is the short version of our regular lessons - just tell me about your wishes and describe your goals.

pro_course_detail.title: Lessons for beginners
pro_course_detail.description: We'll start with the alphabet and pronunciation (but even on the first lesson you'll learn some russian phrases) or with rammar and speaking topics, if you already know the letters.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading and discussing Russian authors OR Russian news and articles
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson is for you if you know Russian well enough to read with the dictionary and to speak. We are going to read a fragment of a Russian text, get to know some information about the author and discuss the text. You can choose any author, even modern one, but if you have no preferences, I can suggest you Chekhov, Dostoevsky, Tolstoy, Shukshin or Turgenev.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking (+ grammar advices)
pro_course_detail.description: I'll give you some topics or we'll discuss the topic you want. Sometimes we can describe pictures. During our conversation I'm going to write down your mistakes and after the lesson I'll send you personal grammar recommendations for you to practice on certain grammatical topics (you can do it by yourself or with me).

teacher_info.intro:
NOTE: I  DO NOT ACCEPT LESSON REQUESTS IN LESS THAN 24 HOURS.

Looking for a native not only to chat with but to learn from? You're at the right door – delivering well-thought-out informative lessons is my passion. You'll get endless opportunities to use your target language and experience its world. We'll carefully pick out contemporary resources to meet your level and interests. Consistent learners and discussion lovers – you're welcome! :)

Discussion lessons, grammar workouts, kids lingua-masterclasses are to your choice. Free e-mail support plus resources recommendations for all of my students.
teacher_info.short_signature: Structured lessons for beginners. In-depth advanced discussions. Looots of talking. For you.
teacher_info.introduction:
Do you enjoy talking about books, films, psychology, global and (or) controversial issues? 

Do you prefer to work a lot on your own and just need somebody to guide you and check whether you are on the right way? 

Are you organized and motivated and seeking somebody who can select nice-looking, info-saturated modern resources to make your learning more insightful, enjoyable and rewarding?

It is me who may be the answer. I have been teaching offline and online since 2012. And my students have always been appreciating my informative, well-structured lessons based on their personal fascinations. Learning with me also means getting lesson pdfs/word lists, recommendations on useful resources and after-class support. 

I work with young learners too. My kids’ lessons are carefully organized, with cartoons, songs and handcrafting. With your parental support and my consistent help, your child will soon become a confident language user. 

So, if you know why you are learning the language and if you are interested in a well-thought-out studying, you are welcome. Hope to talk to you in person :) Good luck with languages!
teacher_info.about_me:
NOTE: I  DO NOT ACCEPT LESSON REQUESTS IN LESS THAN 24 HOURS.

Looking for a native not only to chat with but to learn from? You're at the right door – delivering well-thought-out informative lessons is my passion. You'll get endless opportunities to use your target language and experience its world. We'll carefully pick out contemporary resources to meet your level and interests. Consistent learners and discussion lovers – you're welcome! :)

Discussion lessons, grammar workouts, kids lingua-masterclasses are to your choice. Free e-mail support plus resources recommendations for all of my students.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Since I was a little girl, I have been dreaming to become a teacher – dreams come true :) I appreciate the privilege to be the reason for good changes in someone's life. I love meeting dedicated and motivated people who are excited about my native language and culture – I am just happy to be their devoted guide in the language world. A special joy is to be a teacher for kids. I am delighted to see how they rejoice in their victories in learning, how enthusiastic about everything new they are.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I love helping motivated people who are interested in a well-thought-out studying.  My lessons are informative and well-structured. Before/after each session you get an email with a pdf, files, and useful links. I prefer a systematic approach to learning: we can follow a textbook or I can develop a personalized course for you. For B1+ students I love having discussions on culture, psychology and global issues. My kids’ lessons are carefully organized, with cartoons, songs and handcrafting.
teacher_info.cancel_policy: I wait for 15 min, and if the student does not show up, we consider it a missed lesson. pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
➠ Are you a complete beginner? 
➠ Have you started learning the basics on your own and now feel stuck?
Then this course is for you.

Every lesson involves a lot of speaking, right from the start.

You will gradually learn* :
• how to TALK on various real-life topics, describe things and events and express your opinion;
• how to UNDERSTAND songs, the radio, news, films, etc.
• how to READ newspapers, forums, blogs, and books; 
• how to WRITE letters, blog entries, ​and commentaries.

* We can focus on one skill that is most important for you or master the 4 of them. 

All the materials are real-life, e.g songs, menus, surveys, infographics, recipes, photostories, commercials and ads, poems, sketches, anecdotes, questionnaires, cartoons, film extracts, magazine articles, etc.

IF YOU BUY A SESSION, you'll get:
• a PDF with all the material for the lesson
• teacher's commentaries and/or useful links for the self-study
• an online set of flashcards with the vocabulary from the lesson
• a follow-up test after every 5th lesson (to make sure you are making progress) 
∙ 24/7 teacher's support via email 

At the beginning, all the explanations are given in English, so you're going to understand everything from the very first session.

✔︎ Do you want to get unstuck in your occasional self-studying? 
✔︎ Would you like to experience how it feels when you can express yourself in Russian and people understand you and you get them? 

☛ Let's work towards these goals together! ⤴︎

It's for you if you know Russian at an intermediate level and now want:

∙ to master your speaking and listening skills in particular

These discussion lessons are based on film extracts, cartoons, songs, commercials, blog entries, articles, radio programs, paintings and photostories, etc. You choose the topics that are interesting for you – I prepare the discussion.

me vocabulary or grammar

pro_course_detail.title: Basic English For Everyday Life (beginners-intermediate)
pro_course_detail.description:
➠ Are you tired of occasional self-studying?
➠ Would you like to speak in simple, clear and correct sentences?
➠ Do you want to feel confident in everyday situations (in a multilingual office, while traveling, in the social media, etc.)?

If you have tried many times and have never found yourself at the level where you would like to be, then this course is for you. You need structure, consistency and the power of basic language patterns to move you on. 

The lessons are based on Oxford and Cambridge communicative courses.

You will: 
• understand the structure of English (how to build sentences, how grammar works)
• learn the minimum of most useful words enough to speak and understand the basics
• feel more confident in the everyday life in an English-speaking environment

24/7 teacher's support via email. You will also get useful links for the self-study.

All the learning materials are provided by the teacher.

Shall we start?
___________________________________________________________________________
 (in Russian) ⬇︎
➠ Устали заниматься самостоятельно время от времени?
➠ Хотите говорить простыми, понятными и правильными предложениями?
➠ Хотите чувствовать себя уверенно в повседневных ситуациях (в многоязычном офисе, в поездках, в социальных сетях)?

Если вы много раз начинали, но так и не достигли того уровня, какого хотели, тогда этот курс для вас. Для того чтобы сдвинуться с места, вам нужна структура, последовательность и знание простых языковых принципов. 

Уроки основаны на коммуникативных курсах изд-в Оксфорда и Кембриджа.

Благодаря этому курсу:
• вы поймёте структуру английского (как строить предложения, как работает грамматика)
∙ выучите минимум самых полезных слов, достаточный для того, чтобы говорить и понимать самое простое
∙ начнёте чувствовать себя увереннее в повседневной жизни в англоязычной среде

Постоянная поддержка учителя через э-майл. 
Рекомендации (полезные ссылки) для самостоятельной работы.
Все учебные материалы предоставляются учителем.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! 
Nice to meet you, I am Katia, certified teacher of Russian as a second language with certificate from Moscow State University with ~3 years of experience. 
I also have a masters degree in Sociology (Sociologist and teacher of sociology) .

Being originally from South of Russia I stayed in some countries where I participated in student exchange or volunteering programs ( USA, Spain, India , Brazil ) and visited around 35. I am fascinated by cultures and languages.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I can help you if :

- you are beginner and have no idea how Russian alphabet even looks like
- you have already studied language but it’s hard to achieve steady results without tutor
- you want to work on pronunciation / cases / verbs or something specific
- you are planning to travel or move to Russia ( or other Russian speaking country ) and much more
The topics for our conversational practice could include travelling, sociology, theater, Russian literature, music, art, etc.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
As per materials, I like to combine different books with videos, audio files, songs, etc based on the interest, level and goal of the student.
My classes are fun but structured, I am always up  to have a good laugh but at the same time prioritizing progress. Students say I am very patient and nice , I like to believe so as well =)
I am student and result oriented teacher, trying to find the key for each student so they can reach maximum of their potential.
 At the moment I  only teach adults.
Reach me out and schedule a trial class!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian A1 - A2   in a GROUP every Tuesday and Friday (start 4th of October)
pro_course_detail.description:
Waiting for you the 4th of October!

Hello! I invite you to a Russian language course, soon you will be able to talk with Russian friends, read Russian books, watch Russian movies, and even keep your blog  in Russian. In the lessons we will  fantasize and create! 
And also you can successfully pass the TORFL exams А2!    I will send you all the books and all the materials you need (audio, video, test, grammar, vocabulary). You will receive your homework by mail after each lesson. You can always contact me for support. I am looking forward to seeing you in my lessons!

pro_course_detail.title: Individual lessons Russian / Greek  & preparation for  exams  B2 -  C2
pro_course_detail.description:
At level B2, we will talk about unemployment, internet addiction, gambling addiction, bad habits and youth problems. We will practice the use of proverbs and sayings, phrase logical units. As well as the use of antonyms and synonyms in speech, the expression of various emotions. We will compose stories from pictures.
 At C1 level, we can discuss generational conflict, brain drain, space exploration, demographic and migration issues. We will use different language means of objection and consent. Express intentions with appropriate intonation means. Learn to solve conflicts.
 At the C2 level, we'll talk about cloning, globalization, urbanization, euthanasia. We will learn to perform in front of an audience with a monologue. Defend your point of view in a conversation, give arguments and examples. We will be discussing movies and books and pictures.
 And also you can successfully pass the TORFL exams B2 -C2!    I will send you all the books and all the materials you need (audio, video, test, grammar, vocabulary). You will receive your homework by mail after each lesson. You can always contact me for support. I am looking forward to seeing you in my lessons!

teacher_info.about_me: Hey! My name is Alex and I live in Baku. I myself was born and raised in Russia, but in 2019 I moved to Turkey, and recently I started living in Azerbaijan. teacher_info.about_teacher:
An individual approach for each student. 
Do you need speaking practice? No problem! 
Want to understand grammar? We'll explain! 
During the class, we listen to audios and watch videos and, of course, give homeworks. I use modern textbooks, for example, İstanbul Yabancılar için Türkçe, Azerbaijanı for Beginners.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons focus primarily on speaking ability and secondarily on grammar to reinforce the learning process. There will always be a determined effort on my part to create a relaxing atmosphere in our lessons. Thanks to this and my continued support, I am sure that you will speak a lot from the first lesson.

Since repetition and knowledge of basic structures is so important for learning a language quickly, I made it a habit to use the same words and language structures over and over in my lessons after introducing them to my students.
At the beginning of this lesson, we'll probably talk about your day to warm up and practice small talk.
